text: Physics Education is a peer-reviewed academic journal that covers the teaching of physics at the secondary school and introductory undergraduate levels. Its scope includes ideas and guidance for classroom teaching, demonstrations and laboratory experiments, international news on education developments, book reviews, equipment and multimedia products. The editor-in-chief is Gary Williams. The journal is abstracted and indexed in Inspec and ERIC/CIJE. ==References== ==External links== * Category:IOP Publishing academic journals Category:Bimonthly journals Category:Physics education in the United Kingdom Category:Publications established in 1966 Category:English-language journals Category:Physics education journals
title: Physics Education
